welcome_message_body: Welcome to Virginia Beach, where the beautiful coastline meets the lively boardwalk. Enjoy the city's charm, famous for its pristine beaches and vibrant atmosphere, and make the most of your stay by exploring all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Bee & The Biscuit
restaurants.description: The Bee & The Biscuit is a new american restaurant located in Virginia Beach.
restaurants.address: 1785 Princess Anne Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

restaurants.name: Jose Tequilas
restaurants.description: Jose Tequilas is a mexican restaurant located in Virginia Beach.
restaurants.address: 2101 McComas Way (Nimmo Parkway), Virginia Beach, VA 23456

restaurants.name: LongHorn Steakhouse
restaurants.description: LongHorn Steakhouse is a steakhouse located in Virginia Beach.
restaurants.address: 3400 Princess Anne Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

restaurants.name: Peter Chang
restaurants.description: Peter Chang is a chinese restaurant located in Virginia Beach.

restaurants.name: Brixx Wood Fired Pizza
restaurants.description: Brixx Wood Fired Pizza is a pizzeria located in Virginia Beach.
restaurants.address: 1909 Landstown Centre Way, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norfolk International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Norfolk International Airport serves Delta and American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Norfolk International Airport serves Southwest and United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
